title: Grosse Ile- Beautiful 2 Bedroom 1.5 Bath Unit Available Now!
posting_body: ["Are you looking for an apartment that isn't just cozy but is also modern and on-trend with current interior designs?", 'If so then this is the apartment for you!', 'This 2 bedroom, 1.5 bath unit features stainless steel appliances including a refrigerator, stove, dishwasher, and microwave, beautiful modern subway tiling, new paint, and new fixtures throughout.', 'The building is in Grosse Ile and features numerous updates.', 'Sorry, No Pets.', 'Unit features:', '-Stainless-Steel Appliances (Refrigerator, Microwave, Stove, and Dishwasher.)', '-Beautiful Modern Subway Tiling', '-Gorgeous White Cabinetry', '-Beautiful Granite Countertops', '-Updated Bathroom Fixtures', '-Updated Lighting', '-Hardwood & Carpet Flooring', 'Available now!', '$1,145 Monthly Rent', '$1,145 Security Deposit', 'For more information or to schedule an appointment for showing call', 'show contact info', '.', 'Also enjoy features such as online rent payment, online maintenance requests, and online applications.', 'Thank you for your interest.', 'Cities close by Southgate, Wyandotte, Riverview, Trenton, Gibraltar, Woodhaven, and Brownstown.']
